metadata.title: CVE-2019-13990 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
initDocumentParser in xml/XMLSchedulingDataProcessor.java in Terracotta Quartz Scheduler through 2.3.0 allows XXE attacks via a job description.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-13990` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libquartz2-java - 2.3.0-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libquartz-java package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libquartz2-java package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-3').
